title: Bearnaise Steak
instructions: Prepare béarnaise sauce: simmer white wine vinegar with shallots and tarragon until reduced, then whisk into egg yolks over a double boiler, slowly adding melted butter.
Season planted.steak with salt and freshly ground black pepper on both sides.
Heat a cast-iron skillet over high heat with olive oil until very hot.
Sear the steak for 3-4 minutes per side until a golden crust forms.
Let the steak rest for 2 minutes, then transfer to a warm plate.
Spoon generous amounts of béarnaise sauce over the steak and garnish with fresh tarragon leaves.
